metadata.title: CVE-2022-23613 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: xrdp is an open source remote desktop protocol (RDP) server. In affectedversions an integer underflow leading to a heap overflow in the sesmanserver allows any unauthenticated attacker which is able to locally accessa sesman server to execute code as root. This vulnerability has beenpatched in version 0.9.18.1 and above. Users are advised to upgrade. Thereare no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: xrdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
